I am a passionate and results-driven Computer Vision Engineer with a proven track record of turning vision into reality for my 25+ clients. With more than 4 years of hands-on experience implementing Deep Learning and Computer Vision algorithms in a variety of domains, I strive to bring forth the best of academic research and Industry requirements customized to your needs.


🌐Field of Expertise:

➖Object Detection and Recognition: Identifying and localizing objects within images or videos in complex scenarios and custom objectives.
➖Image Classification: Categorizing images into predefined classes or categories including multi-class and multi-labels.
➖Face Recognition: Identifying and verifying individuals based on facial features. Applications include Facial authentication, security systems, and user identification.
➖Gesture Recognition: Understanding and interpreting hand, body and eye gestures for human-computer interaction.
➖Image Instance & Semantic Segmentation: Taing object detection to the next stage, rather than just classifying the region of an image how about classifying each pixel? Dividing an image into segments or regions with similar characteristics.
➖Medical Imaging: Analyzing medical images for diagnosis, treatment planning, and research. Applications: X-ray analysis, MRI image segmentation, and pathology detection.
➖Video Analysis and Object Tracking: Analyzing and extracting information from video streams. Applications include Surveillance, action recognition, video classification, person tracking and sports analytics.
➖Industrial Inspection: Automated inspection of manufactured products for quality control.
➖Agricultural Vision: Monitoring and optimizing agricultural processes using computer vision. Applications include: Monitoring cattle, crop disease classification, Land management etc.


🛠️ Technical Proficiency:

➡️Deep Learning: Transformers, Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), Variational Autoencoders.
➡️Image Processing: Feature extraction, Segmentation, Traditional image processing
➡️Tools: OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch, PyTorch Lightning, Scikit-learn, Dlib, Keras, NVIDIA CUDA
